column1: Visitation is at Johnson Funeral Home on Friday
column3: 2015 from 6:00 PM until 8:00 PM. Funeral services will be held at 11:00 AM on Saturday
column5: 2015 at the Church of the Good Shepherd with Father Jack Myers officiating
column6: preceded by a chapel viewing in the church from 10:00 AM until the start of the service. Burial will follow in Highland Memory Gardens Cemetery.
